00027     class render_buffer;
00028 
00029     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030     //
00031     // Support native MAC pixel format A-R-G-B 32 bit
00032     //
00033     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034     class render_argb32
00035     {
00036     public:
00037         render_argb32(render_buffer* rbuf) :
00038             m_rbuf(rbuf)
00039         {
00040         }
00041 
00042         void  clear(const color& c);

00044         color get_pixel(int x, int y);
00045         void  rectangle(rect rc, const color& c);
00046         void  copy_from(render_argb32* from, rect rc_from, int x_to, int y_to);
00047 
00048     protected:
00049         render_buffer* rbuf() { return m_rbuf; }
00050 
00051     private:
00052         render_buffer* m_rbuf;
00053     };
